alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 2:15AM MST until January 04 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
